apps.name: mybatteryok(我的电池OK)v2.12.7
apps.version_info:
Free app for displaying battery usage information and setting battery level and temperature alarms to remind you to use the battery correctly
免费app，用于显示电池使用情况信息，并可以设置电量、温度报警来提醒你正确使用电池

apps.name: topwisdom(最高智慧)v1.0
apps.version_info:
Free app(Simplified Chinese only), including 20 mini games, and finally genuine videos
免费app(仅简体中文)，包括20个小游戏,最后还有正品视频。

apps.name: app and soft discuss forum(应用和软件论坛)
apps.version_info:
